basics.name: Joseph Heintz
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
University of Hawaii Maui College, Kahului, HI

highlights: Helped customers with their needs and projects
Licensed with several different machines to perform stocking duties
Kept department clean and well organized in conjunction with coworkers and managers
Had to multitask and balance plating, meal prep, and cooking tasks
Learned a lot of new things quick to perform my job sufficiently
Coordinated with coworkers to get quality food out to customers quickly and smoothly

work.summary: Did meal prep and washed dishes at the Kalei's Pukalani restaurant
highlights: Worked with several coworkers in a very small work space while managing different tasks
Helped cook food for first responders during the Lahaina fire

volunteer.summary: Helped with a massive cleanup at the windmills on the West Maui Mountains
highlights: Participated in cleaning several sites and removing an invasive species of plant called Fireweed
Attended this event with my Mother and employees of Ka'anapali Ocean Resort

volunteer.summary: Assisted Head Coach with various tasks
highlights: Ran drills with the team and occasionally trained specific individuals' skills
Chaperoned the team during games and tournaments as well as help with team decisions

awards.title: Biliteracy Seal in Japanese
awards.summary: Awarded to students that pass the Hawaii State Biliteracy test, deeming the student biliterate in Japanese
